featured.text: When the kernels start 38 , shake the pot to let the steam escape and to let the unpopped kernels fall to the bottom.
All that is 37 is a large, high pot, about four tablespoons of vegetable oil and a small handful of organic popcorn kernels.

definition.zh_def: 核心；種子或果仁的內部部分。
definition.en_def: The central or most important part of something; also refers to the seed or inner part of a fruit.
definition.example: The kernel of the idea is to improve communication within the team.
